Class Graph.Vertex<T extends CostObject<T>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • Graph.Vertex<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of the object the vertex contains.
    Enclosing class:
    Graph<T extends CostObject<T>>

    public static class Graph.Vertex<T extends CostObject<T>>
extends java.lang.Object
    A vertex class. Contains the location of the vertex, its id and all of its neighbors.

      Constructor used for the taxis.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Vertex

        public Vertex(T location)
        Constructor used for nodes. We don't need ID after reading so put it to zero.
        Parameters:
        location - The coordinates of the node.

      • Vertex

        public Vertex(T location,
              int id)
        Constructor used for the taxis. We need the IDs. No edges.
        Parameters:
        location - The coordinates of the taxi.
        id - The ID of the taxi.
